20101231010101.000|20101231010102.000|CC1|CORPORATIONS.

20101231010112.000|20101231010115.000|CC1|SENTENCED TO SIX MORE YEARS IN

20101231010155.000|20101231010200.000|CC1|CAMPAIGNED AGAINST ANOREXIA, AND

20101231010227.000|20101231010233.000|CC1|OF THE JUDICIAL SYSTEM.

20101231010242.000|20101231010243.000|CC1|SEVERAL GOVERNMENTS HAVE        
20101231010243.000|20101231010245.000|CC1|CONDEMNED THE VERDICT WITH

20101231010323.000|20101231010326.000|CC1|BEHIND BARS FOR THE NEXT        
20101231010326.000|20101231010331.000|CC1|PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION IN 2012.  
20101231010331.000|20101231010334.000|CC1|>> I BELIEVE THE SENTENCE IS    
20101231010334.000|20101231010336.000|CC1|ABSOLUTELY ILLEGAL AND NOT BASED

20101231010942.000|20101231010946.000|CC1|PARALYZED AT LEAST FOUR CITIES. 
20101231010946.000|20101231010952.000|CC1|FUEL COSTS ARE UP 70%.

20101231010954.000|20101231010956.000|CC1|SUPPLIES IN NORTHERN IRELAND HAS
20101231010956.000|20101231010957.000|CC1|GONE INTO AN 11TH DAY.

20101231011104.000|20101231011106.000|CC1|>> IT IS NOT JUST HOMES THAT

20101231011127.000|20101231011138.000|CC1|>> PEOPLE ARE GETTING WATER
